Here is the list of scores for each zodiac sign at work, along with a brief description:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable, hardworking, and practical, but can be resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted, adaptable, and communicative, but can be easily distracted.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Nurturing, empathetic, and protective, but can be overly emotional and moody.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident, charismatic, and passionate, but can be prideful and domineering.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical, meticulous, and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 7/10 - Diplomatic, social, and balanced, but can be indecisive and overly concerned with appearances.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Intense, passionate, and perceptive, but can be obsessive and secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous, optimistic, and freedom-loving, but can be blunt and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Disciplined, responsible, and ambitious, but can be rigid and overly serious.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian, independent, and inventive, but can be unconventional and rebellious.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Compassionate, imaginative, and sensitive, but can be dreamy and easily influenced.
